Hiring Policy for Recruiters at IIT Gandhinagar:

Full Time Hiring (Placement)

  • A student can avail a maximum of 2 job offers through CDS. A student can apply for companies until he/she gets a job offer. After getting offer from one company, a student can participate for any round/process for another company only under following circumstances:
      • The CTC offered by the company is more than twice of the CTC with which the student is placed (the 2X rule).
      • The present offer held by the student is in a non-core profile and the student wants to appear for core profile.
  • Spot offers are not allowed at IIT Gandhinagar. Result of all the organizations of a particular day will be declared together. If a student is selected in more than one organization, students have to choose any one offer as per their liking within 48 hours of receiving a second offer and communicate their decision to the CDS office.
  • All the teaching jobs are considered under core category.
  • PPOs channeled through CDS, once accepted, will be counted as a job offer and rest of the CDS rule becomes applicable unless the student rejects the offer in which case s/he is eligible to use CDS placement services as per normal rules.
  • Once a student receives an offer from any company, other than through PPO route which will be governed by above rule, he / she is considered as placed irrespective of student’s acceptance or rejection of the offer.
  • In cases where the student wishes to reject an on-campus placement offer, he/she has to inform CDS within 15 days of securing the offer or 15th April whichever is earlier.
  • If you are simultaneously appearing in the hiring process for two companies, say A&B, if the results of A delays and if you are selected in B company, this will be treated as the first offer and vice versa.

 

Internship Hiring

  • IITGN follows one student one internship policy and encourages students to apply for internship ONLY if they are interested. Students will be considered for the particular organization/institute for the internship from where the selection result will come first (out of all the opportunities that student has applied).
  • In rare cases, there may be more than one parallel running final interviews on the same day, if selected in more than one organization, students will have the option to choose anyone within 48 hours and communicate about their final decision to CDS.
  • Once a student receives an offer from any company, he / she is considered as placed irrespective of student’s acceptance or rejection of the offer. Students receiving an offer from one company will be automatically restricted to apply for any more companies.
  • If you are simultaneously appearing in the hiring process for two companies, say A&B, if the results of A delays and if you are selected in B company, this will be treated as the first offer and vice versa.
